mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board(SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATEDATE, ID, CATEGORY) VALUES ( seq_notice_board.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{member.id}, #{category} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS PAGE, Z.* FROM (SELECT seq, title, createdate, category FROM notice_board ORDER BY seq DESC) Z ) WHERE PAGE = #{page}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS PAGE, Z.* FROM (SELECT seq, title, createdate, category FROM notice_board WHERE ${searchArea} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY seq DESC) Z ) WHERE page = #{page}
SELECT ceil(count(1)/10) FROM notice_board WHERE category = #{category} AND ${searchArea} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT ceil(count(1)/10) FROM notice_board WHERE ${searchArea} LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT n.seq, n.title, n.content, n.createdate, n.updatedate, n.category, n.id, m.name FROM notice_board n JOIN member m ON n.id = m.id WHERE n.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = SYSDATE, id = #{member.id}, category = #{category} WHERE seq = #{seq}
